elements.name: palmInstructions
elements.html:
🖐️ How to Take the Perfect Palm Photo

  • Use your left hand
  • Ensure good lighting (avoid shadows)
  • Stretch your fingers comfortably
  • Remove accessories like rings
  • Keep your entire palm visible

⚠️ Important: If your image is not clear or not a real hand, your palm reading will not be generated. The session will still be counted as used.
